title: INTEGRATION_worlds_installed test is slow in jenkins

content.raw:
The `INTEGRATION_worlds_installed` test checks every file in the `worlds` subfolder, which includes downloading all included models. This test takes less than 30 seconds on my desktop on laptop, which have the gazebo_models repository cloned, but it takes 4-5 minutes on the jenkins machines:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/96/testReport/(root)/WorldsInstalled/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/46/testReport/(root)/WorldsInstalled/
content.html:
The INTEGRATION_worlds_installed test checks every file in the worlds subfolder, which includes downloading all included models. This test takes less than 30 seconds on my desktop on laptop, which have the gazebo_models repository cloned, but it takes 4-5 minutes on the jenkins machines:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/96/testReport/(root)/WorldsInstalled/
  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/46/testReport/(root)/WorldsInstalled/
